 Promotion for new prepaid subscribers in March - 0VND Pre-paid Starterkit. 
 1. Eligible subscribers: 
 
 MobiCard, MobiZone, Mobi4U, MobiQ, Mobi365: activate and top up 
 Not applicable for Q -Student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 (including o ther StarterKits change to Q -Student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 before or after activation) 
 
 2. Benefits:  Price of a starterkit : 15.000 VND with an available account : 0VND 
 a. Promotion for first top-up: 
 
 
 
 
 First top-up card 
 
 
 Promotion right after activation 
 
 
 
 
 KM2 Credit 
 
 
 KM3 Credit 
 
 
 Total bonus

 A ctivation without recharging : the subscriber will be blocked one way communication (Inact status) from 12 pm of the activation date , after next 10 days will be blocked two way communication (Deact status). 
 
 
 Activation with recharging: The usage time of the first top up, as following : 
 
 
 Mobi365: 365 days 
 
 
 MobiQ: 60 days 
 
 
 MobiCard and MobiZone: 60 days 
 
 
 Mobi4U: the usage days will be expired when the account is empty. 
 
 
 
 
 Term and condition to receive benefits : recharging before deact. 
 
 
 b. Promotion for next 10 recharges : applicable for starterKits of this promotion. 
 
 
 Recharge before grace period and before the 90th day from activation date. 
 
 
 Validity period:  26/03 /2012-31/05/2012. 
 
 
 Especially, MobiCard and MobiZone will be duplicated usage days. 
 
 
 Up to 50% EXTRA top-up credits as following:

 2012&#45380;3&#50900; &#50836;&#44552;&#51060; &#50630;&#45716; &#49352; &#44032;&#51077; &#49440;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016; (KM hòa mạng bộ 0đ tháng 3/2012). 
 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; : 
 
 
 MobiCard, MobiZone, Zone+, Mobi4U, MobiQ, Mobi365: &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#44032;&#44036;&#46041;&#50504; &#49352; &#49440;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#44032; &#44060;&#53685; &#54980; &#52395;&#48264;&#51704; &#52649;&#51204;&#54624; &#46412; &#52649;&#51204; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44552;&#50529;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796; .

  3. &#54532;&#47196;&#47784;&#49496; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#44592;&#44036;: 2012 &#45380; 3 &#50900; 26 &#51068; ~2012 &#45380; 3 &#50900; 31 &#51068;
